timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-09-03T10:16:39", "sender_email": "saba1380asadi@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "willenhouse@prestigestudentliving.com", "subject": "Re: SUBJECT: ACCOUNT IN ARREARS \u00a0PAYMENT DUE WITHIN 7", "message": "Dear Property Manager,\\n\\nI am writing regarding the recent email I received about an outstanding balance on my account (CHA516248).\\n\\nPlease note that I made the first instalment payment on 22 August 2025, on schedule. I kindly request that you review your records to confirm this payment and update my account accordingly.\\n\\nPlease let me know if you require a receipt or transaction reference.\\n\\nThank you for your assistance, and I look forward to your confirmation.\\n\\nBest regards,\\nSaba Asadi\\n\\nOn Tue, Sep 2, 2025, 15:43 [willenhouse@prestigestudentliving.com]() <[willenhouse@prestigestudentliving.com]()> wrote:\\n\\nDear Saba Asadi\\n(CHA516248)\\n\\nACCOUNT IN ARREARS PAYMENT DUE WITHIN 7 DAYS\\n\\nYou currently have an outstanding balance due on your account.\\n\\nWe recently wrote to you regarding the outstanding balance on your account, this balance remains unpaid.\\n\\nTo prevent your account progressing to the next stage of our debt recovery process, which could result in independent debt collection agency intervention. Please ensure this amount is paid immediately. Failure to pay may result in additional fees and/or interest being added to your account.\\n\\nHOW TO PAY\\n\\nTransfermate - If you wish to pay by bank transfer or card payment in any other currency than GBP (\u00a3), we recommend making payment on Transfermate by clicking the following link: [https://homesforstudents.transfermateeducation.com/]()\\nIMPORTANT: Please include your Student ID in the payment reference field so we know the payment is from you.\\nBank transfer details of which can be found in our previous communications (If you are making payment via bank transfer, please ensure you put your booking name/Homes for Students ID number as the reference).\\n\\nOnline Account - Payments can also be made via our website by clicking on 'My Account' and logging in or going to: [https://kxweb.wearehomesforstudents.com/pages/En/LoginRegister/MyAccount/Register.aspx]()\\n\\nCredit/Debit Card Payment* We can send you a link via text message to make the payment via our Global Pay link.\\n\\nWe will also be contacting your guarantor, who is liable for all outstanding balances.\\n\\nPlease note, failure to make payment with the next 7 days will result in you being sent to the next stage of our debt recovery process. Failure to pay may result in additional fees and/or interest being added to your account.\\n\\nIf you have any questions regarding this letter, please contact the site team directly.\\n\\nYours sincerely\\n\\nProperty Manager\\nCharles Morton Court\\n\\n*not all properties are able to offer this facility", "snippet": "Dear Property Manager, I am writing regarding the recent email I received about an outstanding balance on my account (CHA516248). Please note that I made the first instalment payment on 22 August 2025,", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "willenhouse@prestigestudentliving.com", "student_email": "saba1380asadi@gmail.com"}

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Sa.
Speaker B: It's sam.
Speaker C: It's.
Speaker D: Yeah, Hello?
Speaker E: Yeah.
Speaker F: Andrew, the site following you from Amster.
Speaker A: I'm calling you from ama.
Speaker F: Student as well as regarding the student accommodation, actually.

Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello, am I speaking with Saba here?
Speaker A: Yes, yes.
Speaker B: Calling you from Amsterdam.
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, calling you from Amber. Student.
Speaker A: Yes, yes, yes, I just applied for an student hall. It's an ensuite.
Speaker B: Okay, I can see that you. We have received the form which you have filled. You wish to proceed ahead with Charles Morton Court, London, correct?
Speaker A: Yes, that's right.
Speaker B: Just wondering here. You have mentioned the carento detail at the emergency contact detail and their phone number is +4 4. So do they live in London? Dr. Meharan?
Speaker A: Yes, yes, that's right.
Speaker B: So I mean, is he going to be the guarantor for you?
Speaker A: Okay. Yes, right, that's correct.
Speaker B: Yeah. So yeah, here the. His address isn't mentioned. So can you please do one thing? Can you please address this full details. Because I will be needing the address of the character as well.
Speaker A: Okay. Okay. Where should I send the address for you? To you.
Speaker B: I will drop your WhatsApp text just now. Just a moment.
Speaker A: Okay. Okay. That's okay. I will send the address.
Speaker B: Okay. Be. Be active on your. Be active on your WhatsApp. I will be. If I need any details, I will be bringing out to you over the WhatsApp office. Okay.
Speaker A: Okay. Okay. That's okay. I'm waiting for your questions. WhatsApp. Thank you so much.
Speaker B: You're welcome. I have dropped your WhatsApp text. Please check.
Speaker A: Sorry, I have your voice really bad. Can you please repeat it?
Speaker B: Yeah. So I have dropped you a WhatsApp text. Please share with the address over there. Okay.
Speaker A: Okay. Okay. Okay. I will send you the address. No problem.
Speaker B: Yeah, sure. Okay.
Speaker A: Okay. Thank you. Have a good day.
